project.name: Karoon
project.description: Prototype durable, fail-safe sorted table engine. Fail-safe here means, for eg, if the JVM crashes for whatever reason in the midst of a write, then on a subsequent run the logical table will still be in a consistent state with all the committed writes. Supports high throughput concurrent reads, writes, and deletes (and effectively updates) with well behaved atomicity, read consistency.
